page.title: 07ORTHOPAEDIC HOSPITAL
page.content: The child who had been in the ward the longest had been completely paralysed in a car accident.He could move his head slightly and talk softly.However with the aid of computers,television,word processors and a whole range of tools made especially for him by the hospital dentist he could communicate and do lessons.The mouthpieces consisted of plastic moulded into the shape of his mouth and metal prongs which seperated the keys of the typewriter.He was permanetly connected to a breathing machine.Around his bed he had lots of interesting pictures,cards and photographs. One showed the{Duchess of {Kent,}the patron of the hospital visiting him,another showed{John {Biffen}the local Member of Parliament.
